body_html:
As @phanousk suggested, this is due to invalid cuda compute capability.
As CUDA developer guide states, the 4 missing functions are supported in devices with compute capability 3.0 and higher.
http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-c-programming-guide/index.html#warp-shuffle-functions

body:
As @phanousk suggested, this is due to invalid cuda compute capability.
As CUDA developer guide states, the 4 missing functions are supported in devices with compute capability 3.0 and higher.
http://docs.nvidia.com/cuda/cuda-c-programming-guide/index.html#warp-shuffle-functions
